comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Is that a whole ermine skin she's grabbing onto around her neck?

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: So bizarre.  I never get use to seeing furs like that in these old photos, nor those hats that incorporate full birds' wings in the construction.  Blech.
